resources.string:
What can you do with Blood Pressure Meter? 

	 This app will help you track your blood pressure and heart rate whenever you want, alerting for some measurements that are not in normal limits. 

	 In the first screen, you should at first create an account and then sign in. After making your registration you can add your new values, reading a QR code that contains them. 

	 You can also analyse all your readings in the history section, and see this results presented in a graph, in the statistics section, where you can select which data you want to see, for example, from the last week, month or year.
